setup.command_description: Set up Tomori for the first time in this server.
setup.no_permission: ğŸš« You need Manage Server permission to run the initial setup!
setup.already_exists: Tomori is already set up on this server! Use `/settings` or `/teach` to modify.
setup.api_prep_description:
To enable Tomori's core AI features, a Google AI API key is required.

â€¢ **Why?** This key allows Tomori to connect to the AI model (Gemini).
â€¢ **Safety:** Your key will be **encrypted** in the database and only used for AI requests from this server. You can delete it anytime via `/settings`.
â€¢ **Privacy:** Please ensure you run this command in a private channel if you haven't already.

Press âœ… to continue to the API key input, or âŒ to cancel setup.
setup.api_modal_success: API Key received (it will be encrypted).
setup.api_key_invalid: ğŸš« The API key you entered is too short or invalid. Please try again with a valid Google AI API key.
setup.api_key_validating: ğŸ” Validating your Google API key... This may take a moment.
setup.api_key_invalid_api: âŒ The API key validation failed. Google rejected this key as invalid. Please check your key and try again.
setup.preset_select_description: Select a starting personality preset for Tomori. You can customize this extensively later using `/teach`.
setup.preset_fetch_error: Could not fetch personality presets from the database. Please try again.
setup.autoch_select_description: Mention the text channels where you'd like Tomori to sometimes chat automatically. You can mention multiple channels separated by spaces. Press 'Skip' if you don't want this feature.
setup.autoch_prompt: Please mention the channel(s) now, or press Skip.
setup.autoch_invalid_channel: One or more mentioned items were not valid text channels. Please try again or Skip.
setup.autoch_threshold_description: After how many messages in the selected channel(s) should Tomori consider chatting? Enter a number (e.g., `50`). Enter `0` to disable this (even if channels were selected).
setup.autoch_threshold_prompt: Please enter a number (0 or higher).
setup.autoch_threshold_invalid: Invalid number. Please enter 0 or a positive whole number.
setup.humanizer_toggle_description: The 'Humanizer' attempts to make Tomori's responses feel less robotic (e.g., adds typing indicators, slight delays). It's experimental. Enable it?
setup.success_description:
Great! Tomori is configured with the **{personality_name}** personality.
You can start chatting by mentioning me or using trigger words (default: Tomori, ã¨ã‚‚).
Use `/teach` and `/settings` to customize further!
setup.cancel_description: Okay, the setup process has been cancelled. You can run `/setup` again anytime!
setup.timeout_description: Looks like you didn't respond in time. The setup has been cancelled. Please run `/setup` again if you'd like to configure me.
setup.error_description: Something went wrong during setup. Please try running `/setup` again.
setup.db_error: A database error occurred while saving settings. Please try again.

general.cooldown: â³ You need to wait {seconds} seconds before using this command again.

errors.command_timeout: This command has timed out! Please try again.
errors.dev_only: Sorry, only developers are allowed to run this command!
errors.test_only: Sorry, this is a test command!
errors.generic_error: There was an error executing this command!

interaction.cancel_description: The operation has been cancelled. You can try again anytime!
interaction.timeout_description: You didn't respond in time. Please try again if you'd like to continue.

tomoriChat.setup_required_description:
To use the chat feature, please set up the following:
â€¢ At least 2 conversation examples using `/teach convo`
â€¢ At least 1 info entry using `/teach info`
You may also use `/setup` to easily choose a personality preset for the bot.
tomoriChat.safety_error_description: ğŸš« Gemini's safety filters blocked the response. This usually happens when the content might violate Google's safety measures.

addBot.rejoin_description: Hey there! Looks like I was re-added to this server. My previous settings and personality are still intact! You can manage me using the `/teach` and `/settings` commands.
addBot.setup_prompt_description: Hello! Thanks for adding me! To get started, someone with the **Manage Server** permission needs to run my `/setup` command to choose my initial personality and configure my AI features.
